problem.markdown: 1. A timer element is made up of ___16 bit words. ( ) Two (x) Three ( ) One ( ) Four 2. In timer element, word zero is for _______ (x) Preset value ( ) Status bits ( ) Accumulated value 3. The preset value of timer 9 , in default timer file 4, is addressed as _________ ( ) T9:4/PRE ( ) T4:9/PRE ( ) T4:9/PRE (x) T4:9.PRE 4. The retentive timer will retain its accumulated value during the following conditions: ( ) When its rung goes false (x) All ( ) Timer-enable bit ( ) When processor losses power ( ) When the processor operating mode is changed from remote run or remote test to remote program mode 5. In word zero, of timer element, bit 14, is the _______ (x) Timer-timing bit ( ) Timer-done bit ( ) Timer-enable bit
problem.p: 1. A timer element is made up of ___16 bit words.
2. In timer element, word zero is for _______
3. The preset value of timer 9 , in default timer file 4, is addressed as _________
4. The retentive timer will retain its accumulated value during the following conditions:

choicegroup.choice: When the processor operating mode is changed from remote run or remote test to remote program mode

problem.p: 5. In word zero, of timer element, bit 14, is the _______
